subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Although he was 12-3 with a 2.16 earned run average in 2006, Francisco Liriano needed surgery and missed the 2007 season. Now Liriano is almost back.
snippet: Although he was 12-3 with a 2.16 earned run average in 2006, Francisco Liriano needed surgery and missed the 2007 season. Now Liriano is almost back.
